org.jsapar.schema

Class Schema

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsapar.schema.Schema
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CsvSchema, FixedWidthSchema

    public abstract class Schema
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    Abstract base class for all type of jsapar schemata. A schema describes how the buffer should be parsed or how the lines of a Document should be written. Usually the parse and output methods are called from one of the in, out or io classes.
    See Also:
    Xml2SchemaBuilder, Schema2XmlExtractor

      • getLineSeparator

        public String getLineSeparator()
        Line separator string. Default value is the system default (Retrieved by System.getProperty("line.separator")).
        Returns:
        the lineSeparator

      • setLineSeparator

        public void setLineSeparator(String lineSeparator)
        Sets the line separator string. Default value is the system default (Retrieved by System.getProperty("line.separator")).
        Parameters:
        lineSeparator - the lineSeparator to set.

      • getLocale

        public Locale getLocale()
        The locale of the schema is used to determine the formatting of for example numbers, decimal separators etc. It does not affect the error messages. Default is en_US.
        Returns:
        the locale

      • setLocale

        public void setLocale(Locale locale)
        The locale of the schema is used to determine the formatting of for example numbers, decimal separators etc. It does not affect the error messages. Default is en_US.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale to set

      • getSchemaLine

        public abstract Optional<? extends SchemaLine> getSchemaLine(String lineType)
        Parameters:
        lineType - The line type to get SchemaLine for.
        Returns:
        The SchemaLine with the supplied line type name. Optional.empty if no such schema line was found.

      • size

        public abstract int size()
        Returns:
        Number of schema lines of this schema.

      • ofXml

        public static Schema ofXml(Reader reader)
                    throws SchemaException,
                           IOException
        Loads a schema instance from an xml that is read from the supplied reader. The xml needs to comply to the JSaParSchema.xsd otherwise a SchemaException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        reader - The reader to read the xml from. Caller is responsible for closing the reader.
        Returns:
        A new schema instance created based on the xml.
        Throws:
        SchemaException - if the supplied xml does not comply to the JSaParSchema.xsd or if there is any other error while loading a schema.
        IOException

      • toXml

        public void toXml(Writer writer)
           throws SchemaException
        Exports this schema instance as xml that complies to the JSaParSchema.xsd.
        Parameters:
        writer - The writer where the xml is written. Caller is responsible for closing the writer.
        Throws:
        SchemaException - if there is an error while writing the xml.

      • stream

        public abstract java.util.stream.Stream<? extends SchemaLine> stream()
        Returns:
        A stream of all schema lines of this schema.

      • iterator

        public abstract Iterator<? extends SchemaLine> iterator()
        Returns:
        An iterator of all schema lines of this schema.

      • makeSchemaParser

        public abstract TextSchemaParser makeSchemaParser(Reader reader,
                                                  TextParseConfig parseConfig)
        Internal method to create a schema parser using this schema.
        Parameters:
        reader - The reader to use for the parser.
        parseConfig - Current parse configuration.
        Returns:
        Create a schema based text parser.
